ruleContent.content:
var item_id = java.hexDecodeToString(result); var book_id = java.get('book_id'); var type = String(java.get('type')); var v = JSON.parse(source.getVariable()); var sz = v.sz; var tone = v.tone; if (type == 1) { book.type = 64; } else if (type == 4 || sz != 0) { book.type = 32; } else { book.type = 8; } if (type == 4 || sz != 0) { if (type == 4) { url = source.bookSourceUrl + `/audio?tone_id=1&item_ids=${item_id}`; } else if (sz != 0) { url = source.bookSourceUrl + `/audio?${tone}&item_ids=${item_id}`; } try { result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]['main_url']; } catch(e) { result = "è¯¥ä¹¦ä¸æ”¯æŒå½“å‰éŸ³è‰²ï¼Œè¯·æ›´æ¢å¹¶åˆ·æ–°"; } } else { let url = source.bookSourceUrl + '/content?item_id=' + item_id; let res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data.content; function getComic(result) { let mat = result.match(/
([\s\S]*?)<\/article>/); try { let cnt = JSON.parse( mat ? mat[1].replace(/\&/g, '"').replace(/\;/g, "").replace(/\#34/g, "") : result ); return (mat ? cnt.skeleton.data : cnt.picInfos) .map((i) => { let path = mat ? cnt.materials[i.element_name].data.web_uri : "novel-pic/" + i.md5; return ``; }) .join("
"); } catch (e) { // not comic content mat = result.match(/([\s\S]*?)<\/body>/) // java.log(result) return (mat ? mat[1] : result).toString().replace(/\<\!DOCTYPE html.*/g, "").replace(/\/, "").replace(/\\<\/a\>/g, "") } } result = getComic(String(res)); } result.replace(/\{\!\-\- PGC_VOICE\:.*\-\-\}/g, "") @@p@html||html

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
	const {java} = this
	$ = JSON.parse(url).data
	if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
		arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
	} else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
		arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
	} else {
		java.toast("è·å– book_id å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½ å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦ç™»å½•ï¼")
	}
	return arr
}
let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['æ‰‹åŠ¨ç™»å½•Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "æœªåˆ†ç»„": []
  }
  // java.log(
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["æœªåˆ†ç»„"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
  })
  java.log(urls)
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else if(/read_history/.test(baseUrl)) {
  bid = getBookIdFull(result);
  id_list = splitArray(bid, 100);
  let urls = [];
  id_list.forEach(i => {
urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
});
  let resp = {book_info: []}
  urls.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(java.ajax(r)).data)
  })
  result = resp;
} else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_info || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data})
</js>

<js>
let book_ids = [];
let book_list = [];
let res = JSON.parse(result);
let i = String(java.get("i"));
let key = String(java.get("key"));
let page = Number(java.get("page"));

try {
  list = res["search_tabs"][i]["data"];
  if(list == null) list = res["search_tabs"][1]["data"];
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(list))
  for (let $ of list) {
            if (!book_ids.includes($.book_id)) {
                book_list.push($.book_data ? $.book_data[0] : $);
                book_ids.push($.book_id);
            }
        }
    } catch (e) {}
    
so = source.getLoginInfoMap()['æœç´¢èšåˆ'] || "0";
if (so == "1" || book_list.length == 0) {
java.toast("å½“å‰ä¸ºæœç´¢èšåˆæ¨¡å¼")
let url = `https://api5-normal-lf.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/search/page/v/?query=${key}&aid=1967&channel=0&os_version=0&device_type=0&device_platform=0&iid=466614321180296&passback=${(page-1)*10}&version_code=999`; 
    let list = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data;
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(list))

    };
    
JSON.stringify(book_list)
